files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    package="com.example.account"
+    android:versionCode="1"
+    android:versionName="1.0" >
+
+    <uses-sdk
+        android:minSdkVersion="8"
+        android:targetSdkVersion="11" />
+	<uses-permission android:name="android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE" />
+    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" />
+    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION" />
+    <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS"></uses-permission>
+     
+    <application
+        android:allowBackup="true"
+        android:icon="@drawable/icon"
+        android:label="@string/app_name"
+        android:theme="@style/AppTheme" >
+        <activity
+            android:name=".MainActivity_Net1314080903221"
+            android:label="@string/app_name" >
+            <intent-filter>
+                <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" />
+
+                <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" />
+            </intent-filter>
+        </activity>
+        <activity android:name=".AddEvent_Net1314080903221"></activity>
+        <activity android:name=".QueryBill_Net1314080903221"></activity>
+        <activity android:name=".QueryByMouthActivity_Net1314080903221"></activity>
+	    <activity android:name=".QueryByTodayActivity_Net1314080903221"></activity>
+        <activity android:name=".Shezhi_Net1314080903221"></activity>
+	    <activity android:name=".Shouru_Net1314080903221"></activity>
+
+    </application>
+
+
+</manifest>
